alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN LYCOMING AND WESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Canton to 12 miles northeast of Montoursville to near Milton. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Montoursville, Muncy, Hughesville, Montgomery, Elimsport, Kettle Creek Gorge, Lairdsville, Muncy Valley, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Loyalsockville, South Williamsport, Picture Rocks, Laporte, Forksville, Eagles Mere, Hillsgrove, Williamsport Airport and Little League World Series Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
